title: The Ball Valve Transformation â€“ GF Piping Systems expands its line of Pro Ball Valves - GF Piping Systems - Cision News
summary: GF Piping Systems has expanded its Pro line of ball valves with the Ball Valve 546 Linear Pro and the Ball Valve 523 Pro.  The new valves feature corrosion-free materials, a simple and reliable operation, as well as various actuation options.  The 546 Linear Pro is designed for applications that require linear flow characteristics, while the 523 Pro is designed for dosing and sampling different types of media.
